column2: You hear a short beep. The door unlocks itself!

column6: I'll see you in the hangar then
I feel a little more prepared now
Just let me know if you want to go again!
Man, the nerves are killing me...
Oh, and uh... stay away from my locker Max
Wish us good luck at the exam today!
Hey buddy. I can sell you a bomb for 300 credits if you're interested.
Just don't tell anyone where you got it, 'kay?

column2: You aquired 1 bomb and lost 300 credits!

column6: You ain't got the credits pal
The weather looks really good today, right?
Perfect flying conditions! You're in luck brother!
With the way you've been training, there's no way you'll NOT pass
But they said it's a really tough one this year
I guess I just really have to concentrate, right?
Besides, what you should REALLY be worrying about...
...is all the cute female cadettes that will want to date you
A stout, handsome pilot like you, they'll be lining up in masses!
Anyway, I wanted to ask you...
There's still a while until the exam starts
Do you think we could take a test ride together?
Just to, you know... refresh the basics?
I'll see you in the hangar then
I feel a little more prepared now
There's no need for that, I'm certain you know the basics in and out!
